purpose: Facilitate the creation of full-stack AI applications by providing a CLI tool that scaffolds projects with best practices.
principle: Utilizes a CLI to generate boilerplate code for AI projects, integrating popular frameworks and tools for front-end and back-end development.
reusability: Highly reusable as a starting point for AI projects; provides a modular architecture that can be extended with additional features and integrations.
limitations: Primarily focuses on project setup; requires further customization for specific use cases. Limited to the frameworks and tools predefined in the scaffolding process.
name: create-rubric-app
description: CLI tool to get started with a full-stack AI project.
highlight: Rapid setup for full-stack AI projects with a focus on simplicity and scalability.
